name: Spongebob Squarepants - Adventures in Unusual Places DEMO
name_original: Spongebob Squarepants - Adventures in Unusual Places DEMO
description:
This is SpongeBob's new adventure! One day SpongeBob went outside to catch jellyfish, but on the way he met a portal. Entering it, he finds himself in 5 unusual worlds where everything is different from the usual worlds. Jellyfish fields in which sea stars instead of jellyfish. Or a Bikini Bottom that is completely drawn with a simple pencil. And many other things! And all this in the game Spongebob Squarepants - Adventures in Unusual Places.

THIS IS DEMO VERSION.

There are only 3 levels in this version. But in all levels there are all the mechanics of the game.
